SEARCH
Package gutek.services

Class TranslationService

java.lang.Object
gutek.services.TranslationService
@Service public class TranslationService extends Object
Service responsible for handling translations and managing locale settings.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final String
    BASE_NAME
    Base name for message resource files.

    locale
    The current locale used for translations.
    private static final Pattern
    LOCALE_PATTERN
    Pattern used to match locale files in the format `messages_{language}_{country}.properties`.
    private final org.springframework.context.MessageSource
    messageSource
    Message source for retrieving localized messages.
    private final AppLocaleSettingRepository
    repository
    Repository for handling persistence of locale settings.

  • Constructor Details

    • TranslationService

      public TranslationService(AppLocaleSettingRepository repository, org.springframework.context.MessageSource messageSource)
      Constructor initializing the repository and message source.
      Parameters:
      repository - Repository for locale settings.
      messageSource - Message source for retrieving translations.

  • Method Details

    • updateLocale

      public void updateLocale(Locale locale)
      Updates the locale setting. If the locale is null, it retrieves the default locale from the database. If the locale is provided, it updates the locale in the database and applies it.
      Parameters:
      locale - The locale to be set, or null to use the default locale from the database.

    • getTranslation

      public String getTranslation(String key)
      Retrieves the translation for a given key based on the current locale.
      Parameters:
      key - The translation key.
      Returns:
      The translated string for the current locale.

    • getCurrentLocale

      public Locale getCurrentLocale()
      Retrieves the current locale. If the locale is not set, it updates the locale from the database.
      Returns:
      The current locale.

    • getAvailableLocales

      public List<Locale> getAvailableLocales()
      Retrieves a list of all available locales based on message property files found in the classpath.
      Returns:
      A list of available locales.

    • processResource

      private void processResource(URL resourceUrl, List<Locale> availableLocales, Set<String> processedResources) throws URISyntaxException, IOException
      Processes a given resource URL based on its protocol type and adds available locales from it.
      Parameters:
      resourceUrl - The URL of the resource.
      availableLocales - The list of available locales to be populated.
      processedResources - The set of resources that have already been processed.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If the URL syntax is incorrect.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while accessing the resource.

    • handleFileProtocol

      private void handleFileProtocol(URL resourceUrl, List<Locale> availableLocales, Set<String> processedResources) throws URISyntaxException
      Handles resources with the "file" protocol, adding any available locales from file-based resources.
      Parameters:
      resourceUrl - The URL of the resource.
      availableLocales - The list of available locales to be populated.
      processedResources - The set of resources that have already been processed.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If the URL syntax is incorrect.

    • handleJarProtocol

      private void handleJarProtocol(URL resourceUrl, List<Locale> availableLocales, Set<String> processedResources) throws IOException
      Handles resources with the "jar" protocol, distinguishing between nested and standard JARs.
      Parameters:
      resourceUrl - The URL of the resource.
      availableLocales - The list of available locales to be populated.
      processedResources - The set of resources that have already been processed.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while accessing the resource.

    • handleNestedJar

      private void handleNestedJar(String fullPath, List<Locale> availableLocales, Set<String> processedResources) throws IOException
      Handles nested JAR files, extracting and adding any available locales from the nested JAR resource.
      Parameters:
      fullPath - The full path of the resource URL.
      availableLocales - The list of available locales to be populated.
      processedResources - The set of resources that have already been processed.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while accessing the resource.

    • handleStandardJar

      private void handleStandardJar(String fullPath, List<Locale> availableLocales, Set<String> processedResources) throws IOException
      Handles standard JAR files, extracting and adding any available locales from the JAR resource.
      Parameters:
      fullPath - The full path of the resource URL.
      availableLocales - The list of available locales to be populated.
      processedResources - The set of resources that have already been processed.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while accessing the resource.

    • getLocalesFromFileResource

      private List<Locale> getLocalesFromFileResource(URL resourceUrl) throws URISyntaxException
      Extracts locales from directory-based resources.
      Parameters:
      resourceUrl - The URL of the file directory.
      Returns:
      A list of Locales found within the directory.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the URI syntax is incorrect.

    • getLocalesFromJarResource

      private List<Locale> getLocalesFromJarResource(String jarPath) throws IOException
      Extracts locales from JAR-based resources.
      Parameters:
      jarPath - The path to the JAR file.
      Returns:
      A list of Locales found within the JAR.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • extractLocaleFromFileName

      private Locale extractLocaleFromFileName(String fileName)
      Extracts a Locale from a given file name if it matches the locale pattern.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The file name to extract the locale from.
      Returns:
      A Locale object if the file name matches the pattern, otherwise null.

    • getOrCreateDefaultAppLocaleSetting

      private AppLocaleSetting getOrCreateDefaultAppLocaleSetting()
      Retrieves or creates the default locale setting in the database.
      Returns:
      The current locale setting from the database, or a new default setting if none exists.

    • decodePath

      private String decodePath(String path)
      Decodes the provided URL-encoded path using UTF-8 encoding. This method is typically used to handle URL-encoded strings, such as paths that contain special characters (e.g., spaces encoded as "%20") and converts them back to their original form.
      Parameters:
      path - the URL-encoded path to decode
      Returns:
      the decoded path as a String
